Method Detail

getParent

public IBooleanSensor getParent()
This is similar to BivariateLogicBooleanSensor's getLeftSensor and getRightSensor functions, but as there is only one determining parent sensor, it is just called the "parent" IBooleanSensor.

Returns:
The parent IBooleanSensor
See Also:
#getLeftSensor, #getRightSensor, getSensor()

getSensor

public IBooleanSensor getSensor()
A convenience alias function for getParent.

See Also:
getParent()

getParentValue

public boolean getParentValue()
A shortcut for extracting the value of the parent IBooleanSensor.

Returns:
getParent().getValue()
